subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets played 20 innings that lasted 6 hours 25 minutes, the longest game at Citi Field, only to fall to the Marlins and lose pitcher Matt Harvey to lower back pain.
snippet: The Mets played 20 innings that lasted 6 hours 25 minutes, the longest game at Citi Field, only to fall to the Marlins and lose pitcher Matt Harvey to lower back pain.
